## loadScriptContent() function

Load the content of a script file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function loadScriptContent(
  relativePath: string
): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

relativePath

</td><td>

string

</td><td>

Path relative to the scripts directory (e.g., "helpers/json.applescript")

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

The script content as a string

## Exceptions

If the file does not exist or cannot be read

## Example

```typescript
const jsonHelpers = await loadScriptContent("helpers/json.applescript");
```
